command.item_converter.generate.restart_: Restart the game/server for changes to take effect.
command.item_converter.generate.kubejs_o: KubeJS detected. Choose an option to load the generated rules:
command.item_converter.kubejs.not_loaded: KubeJS is not installed. Install KubeJS to use this command.
command.item_converter.kubejs.reload_hin: Restart the game/server for changes to take effect.
command.item_converter.kubejs.button.sym: Create symlinks to KubeJS data folder (updates automatically)
command.item_converter.kubejs.button.cop: Copy files to KubeJS data folder (static snapshot)
command.item_converter.kubejs.button.unl: Remove symlinks from KubeJS data folder
command.item_converter.symlink_kubejs.su: Successfully symlinked %d namespace(s) to kubejs/data. Changes will sync automatically.
command.item_converter.symlink_kubejs.no: No generated files found. Run /item_converter generate first.
command.item_converter.copy_kubejs.nothi: No generated files found. Run /item_converter generate first.
command.item_converter.unlink_kubejs.not: No symlinks found in kubejs/data to remove.
command.item_converter.stats: Item Converter: %d rules loaded, %d items, %d conversion paths
